value.title: Samsung Joins Google and Nvidia in Using AI to Design Chips
value.excerpt: Samsung has reportedly started using artificial intelligence features in the Synopsys chip design tool for upcoming processors.

value.title: AI startup Abacus.ai turns on real-time deep learning system for enterprises

value.title: Why machine learning models fail
value.excerpt: Machine learning and data science are important tools in the tech industry. However, if they are used improperly, they may create more problems than they solve.

value.title: Deep Learning Chip Market Trend, Forecast, Drivers, Restraints, Company Profiles and Key Players Analysis by 2028
value.excerpt: The global deep learning chip market is expected to reach a market size of USD 27.75 Billion by 2028 and register a high revenue CAGR, according to latest analysis by Emergen Research. Increasing quantum computing adoption is expected to drive global deep learning chip market growth to a significant extent during the forecast period.

value.title: Social Factors in Machine Learning Models Aid CVD Prediction
value.excerpt: Machine learning approaches are useful for cardiovascular disease prediction, and model performance is improved with inclusion of social determinants of health, according to a review published online July 27 in the American Journal of Preventive Medicine .

value.title: Doubling the performance of visual recognition AI
value.excerpt: Prof. Sunghoon Im, from the Department of Information & Communication Engineering, DGIST, developed an artificial intelligence(AI) neural network module that can separate and convert environmental information in the form of complex images using deep learning.

value.title: FICO Continues to Drive Innovation with 13 New Patents for AI, Machine Learning, Fraud and Decision Management Platform
